titleStmt.title: Westerne Wyll upon the debate betweene Churchyarde and Camell
titleStmt.author: Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the George next to saynt Dunstones Church by Wyllyam Powell,

notesStmt.note: Possibly by William Baldwin: cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: London in Fletestrete at the signe of the George next to saynt Dunstones Church
